issue.title: [compress feature]there are some issue  when copy remote files to local with compress

repository.name: rclone
repository.description: "rsync for cloud storage" - Google Drive, S3, Dropbox, Backblaze B2, One Drive, Swift, Hubic, Wasabi, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob, Azure Files, Yandex Files

issue.body:
when copy remote files to local with compress,then met some error as below:

 ERROR : Attempt 1/3 failed with 3 errors and: multipart copy: read failed: flate: corrupt input before offset 3607\n2021/01/27 18:54:32

Failed to copy with 3 errors: last error was: multipart copy: read failed: flate: corrupt input before offset 3607

body:
> It looks like the compress backend doesn't like multithread copy...
> 
> @wangshuang0220 if you retry with `--multi-thread-streams 0` does it work properly.
> 
> @buengese compress supports seeking doesn't it so this should work I would have thought?

i have tried with   `--multi-thread-streams 0` , it seems work . Is there any other way？Will the 1.54 release version solve this problem？

tks :)

> i have tried with `--multi-thread-streams 0` , it seems work .

Good!

> Is there any other way？Will the 1.54 release version solve this problem？

It will unless we (or most likely @buengese ) comes up with a fix!

I managed to reproduce this quite easily

```
cd /tmp/
# Make a 1GB ish compressible file
for i in `seq 1000`; do cat ~/go/src/github.com/rclone/rclone/MANUAL.md  >> compressible ; done
mkdir /tmp/compress
# Copy it to a compress remote
rclone copy -vv compressible --compress-remote /tmp/compress :compress:
# Try to recover it
rclone copy -vv --compress-remote /tmp/compress :compress:compressible recovered --low-level-retries 1 --retries 1
```

We get

```
$ rclone copy -vv --compress-remote /tmp/compress :compress:compressible recovered --low-level-retries 1 --retries 1
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.54.0-beta.5106.ebac78a2f.fix-azureblob-memory" starting with parameters ["rclone" "copy" "-vv" "--compress-remote" "/tmp/compress" ":compress:compressible" "recovered" "--low-level-retries" "1" "--retries" "1"]
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote ":compress:compressible"
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : Using config file from "/home/ncw/.rclone.conf"
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "recovered"
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : fs cache: renaming cache item "recovered" to be canonical "/tmp/recovered"
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : compressible: Sizes differ (src 1038532000 vs dst 32768)
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : compressible: Starting multi-thread copy with 3 parts of size 330.188M
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : compressible: multi-thread copy: stream 2/3 (346226688-692453376) size 330.188M starting
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : compressible.oL3mPQAAAAA.gz: ChunkedReader.RangeSeek from -1 to 94150702 length -1
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : compressible: multi-thread copy: stream 3/3 (692453376-1038532000) size 330.046M starting
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : compressible.oL3mPQAAAAA.gz: ChunkedReader.RangeSeek from -1 to 188309864 length -1
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : compressible.oL3mPQAAAAA.gz: ChunkedReader.Read at -1 length 4096 chunkOffset 94150702 chunkSize 262144
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : compressible.oL3mPQAAAAA.gz: ChunkedReader.openRange at 94150702 length 262144
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : compressible: multi-thread copy: stream 1/3 (0-346226688) size 330.188M starting
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : compressible: Reopening on read failure after 0 bytes: retry 1/1: flate: corrupt input before offset 103
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : compressible: Reopen failed after 0 bytes read: failed to reopen: too many retries
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : compressible: multi-thread copy: stream 2/3 failed: multipart copy: read failed: flate: corrupt input before offset 103
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : compressible: multi-thread copy: stream 3/3 failed: context canceled
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : compressible.oL3mPQAAAAA.gz: ChunkedReader.Read at -1 length 4096 chunkOffset 0 chunkSize 262144
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : compressible.oL3mPQAAAAA.gz: ChunkedReader.openRange at 0 length 262144
2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : compressible: multi-thread copy: stream 1/3 failed: context canceled
2021/01/28 17:33:57 ERROR : compressible: Failed to copy: multipart copy: read failed: flate: corrupt input before offset 103
2021/01/28 17:33:57 ERROR : Attempt 1/1 failed with 1 errors and: multipart copy: read failed: flate: corrupt input before offset 103
2021/01/28 17:33:57 INFO  : 
Transferred:   	         0 / 0 Bytes, -, 0 Bytes/s, ETA -
Errors:                 1 (retrying may help)
Elapsed time:         0.0s

2021/01/28 17:33:57 DEBUG : 4 go routines active
2021/01/28 17:33:57 Failed to copy: multipart copy: read failed: flate: corrupt input before offset 103
```

Whereas

```
rclone copy -vv --compress-remote /tmp/compress :compress:compressible recovered --low-level-retries 1 --retries 1 --multi-thread-streams 0
```

Works perfectly...

got it,  will v1.54 release in Feb.?

thanks a lot
Looks like there is indeed something very wrong here. I'll probably fix it this weekend so this will go into 1.54.

issue.title: Update sgzip - fixes #4970

repository.name: rclone
repository.description: "rsync for cloud storage" - Google Drive, S3, Dropbox, Backblaze B2, One Drive, Swift, Hubic, Wasabi, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob, Azure Files, Yandex Files

issue.body: #4970 was caused by an issue in my sgzip library. A mistake in the compression code caused seeking to break after the first block. I've fixed this now and improved the tests so this can't happen again. Sadly this does not fix seeking in files compressed with the previous version, the metadata is just plain wrong for them. So these will need to be reuploaded for multistream downloads to work.
